meanings.def: a person who works on a ship as a member of the crew
examples: a crew of two officers and 13 sailors
The vessels are manned by 1  300 sailors.
His father was a US Navy sailor.
Many soldiers, sailors and airmen lost their lives.

meanings.def: a person who sails a boat
examples: The three missing men were experienced sailors.

meanings.def: a person who rarely/often becomes sick at sea

idioms.def: a person who rarely/often becomes sick at sea
